mapper.select:
select a.tagCode, a.tagID, ifnull(a.desc,'') as `desc`, a.gatewayCode, DATE_FORMAT(A.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS regdate, ifnull(a.batteryStat,'') as batteryStat, ifnull(a.connectStat,'') as connectStat, ifnull(a.signalStat,'') as signalStat, ifnull(a.isCall,'') as isCall, a.productPair, a.templateCode, b.gatewayID, ifnull(c.productName,'') as productName, ifnull(c.cateSName,'') as cateSName
from tbl_tag a inner join tbl_gateway b on a.gatewayCode = b.gatewayCode left outer join (select productName,cateSName,tagCode from tbl_product_mapping d inner join tbl_product e on d.productCode = e.productCode inner join tbl_cates f on e.cateSCode = f.cateSCode) c on a.tagCode = c.tagCode where 1=1
and a.gatewayCode = #{gatewayCode}
and tagID like '%' #{tagID} '%'
and batteryStat < 20
and signalStat < 20
and isCall = 'Y'
order by a.regdate desc
mapper.update: update tbl_tag set productPair='N' WHERE tagCode = #{tagCode}
